definitions: displaying excessive or prejudiced support for one's own cause or group, in particular showing male prejudice against women

examples.text: she overcomes the surly objections of her chauvinistic editor to uncover the truth
it is a chauvinistic, male-dominated society

shortDefinitions: displaying prejudiced support for own cause or sex

definitions: feeling or displaying aggressive or exaggerated patriotism

examples.text: a chauvinistic, aggressive brand of nationalism

shortDefinitions: feeling or displaying aggressive or exaggerated patriotism
